document_data.name: Jhalahaskur
document_data.mainbody: The '''Jhalahaskur''' family was one of the twenty [[Onsruur]] families that made up the hereditary council of lords in [[Khôltar]], [[south Faerûn]], ''circa'' the [[1372 DR|Year of Wild Magic, 1372 DR]].{{Cite web/Elminster Speaks archive|87}}{{Cite web/Elminster Speaks/Part 66: Khôltar, Part 17, More on the Onsruur}}
document_data.Organization: The Jhalahaskur bloodline tended to be tall and strong, with blond or light-colored hair. They favored the martial arts and the proper application of force.
document_data.Activities: This family invested in costers and mercenary companies, and did not shy away from the slavery business. Their primary business was in selling weapons.
